pwr.chrzescijanek.filip.gifa.core.util

Class FunctionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • pwr.chrzescijanek.filip.gifa.core.util.FunctionUtils

  • public final class FunctionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utility methods for evaluating functions.
